More about writing on Medium:

How do i start writing on Medium?

First,make a free account. Then, to create a story, click on your profile picture in the top-right corner of the page, then "Write a Story."

How can i make money writng on Medium?

Who writes on Medium?

Anyone can write on Medium.Whether you've never written before or are ready to create a full publication,it's easy to get started and we will allow you

to focus more on big ideas and less on driving clicks. With the option to earn for your work, you cn also be directly rewarded for the value you provide

provide readers.

Do i need to be in the Partner Program to write on Medium?

No, You can write on Medium even if you are not in the Partner Program. If you are in the Partner Program you can also choose which of the stroies you publish are eligible for the Program.For more about the Partner Program,click here.
